bio.name: code with harry
bio.detailed: code with harry, whose real name is Haris ali khan but is also widely known as CodeWithHarry, is an exceptionally popular content creator, educator, and programmer. He is the esteemed founder and leader of CodeWithHarry, a comprehensive online platform exclusively dedicated to tech tutorials and programming education. A significant detail of his background is that he is a graduate of IIT (Indian Institute of Technology), a highly prestigious educational institution in India, which underscores his strong academic foundation in technology. He is widely recognized as one of the oldest and most established Indian YouTubers who has been consistently teaching coding online, having built a monumental presence and trust over many years. His work primarily focuses on demystifying complex programming languages such as Python and JavaScript, which he shares through extensive online courses and engaging video tutorials. His influence stems primarily from his incredibly successful YouTube channel, which has amassed an astounding 7,860,000 subscribers, with his comprehensive tutorials consistently garnering millions of views. While specific details regarding his LinkedIn connections are not fully confirmed in public records, his primary startup association is intrinsically linked to CodeWithHarry itself, which stands as a monumental testament to his entrepreneurial drive and success in the educational content creation sphere.
bio.short: CodeWithHarry, also known as  Haris Ali Khan, is an IIT graduate and one of India's oldest and most successful online coding educators. As the founder of CodeWithHarry, he commands an enormous YouTube following of over 7.8 million subscribers for his programming tutorials.

data.title: Discussing the Capabilities of Anthropic's Coding Model CT 3.7
data.text: Anthropic ne coding ke liye apna recent model ct 3.7 set release kiya hai aur yeh model bahut powerful hai isse n a ke ov se lekar clot ke apne 3.5 sonet ko ekdam beat kar diya hai coding mein iske andar apni reasoning karne ki capability hai jo ki isko dusre model se ekdam alag banati hai empic ka yeh model kuch aisi problems ko solve kar pa raha hai jo ki pehle koi ai model nahi kar paya maine personally isko quadratic mein try kiya quadratic ek ai data analysis ka tool hai jismein aap log ek promt dekar apne pure data ko analyse kar sakte hain and it was insane maine isko home investment ke liye ek financial model banane ke liye bola and i was amazed with the results palt 3.7 set ko aap log quadratic ke andar try out kar sakte hain aur ekdam natural language mein data analysis kar sakte hain i was really amazed with the results i got main quadratic ka link aap logo ko description mein de dunga isko aap log try out zarur karna natural language mein data analysis karne ke liye aapko is model ke bare mein kya kehna hai mujhe niche comment section mein zarur batana

data.title: where he is talking about vs code extension
data.text: is vs code extension ne mere jaise development ko hamesha hamesha ke liye badal diya. n naam ki extension aap logon ki complexion mein kaun-kaun se routes use ho rahe hain aapko batati hai jaise ki aap yahaan dekh sakte hain meri ki jas application mein kaun-kaun se routes hain kaun-kaun se route groups hai ye sab mein ek jagah par visualize kar sakta hoon aur to aur yahaan par click karke main kisi bhi ek particular p . jae ya na bahut jyada mushkil pad jaata hai aise mein ye . n naam ki free extension aapke kaam bahut aane waali hai isko try out zaroor karna aur is tarah ki aur bhi tips jaanani hai to neeche code vi dhaari channel ko subscribe kare

data.title: where he is talking about scaling
data.text: jab kisi ek particular website par load bahut zyada badh jaata hai tab aap logon ko scaling karni padti hai aise mein aapke paas do options hote hain horizontal scaling ya vertical scaling aap log ko ek example se samjhata hoon maan lo aap ek server ke andar apni website ko host karte ho scaling karne ke liye ab us server ko aap log bahut zyada badha sakte ho ya phir alag-alag servers ko laga sakte ho agar aap usi server ko badhate ho to usko vertical scaling bolte hain aur agar aap alag-alag servers ka istemaal karte ho to usko horizontal scaling bolte hain isko main building ki analogy se aapko samjhata hoon maan lo aap logon ke paas bahut zyaara saamaan hai jisko aapne ek building mein bhara hua hai ab agar aapke paas saamaan badh jaata hai to aap log building pe aur floors construct kar sakte hain lekin is kaam ko karne ke liye aap log aur alag-alag buildings ka istemaal bhi kar sakte hain agar aap aur alag-alag buildings ka istemaal karte hain to use horizontal scaling kahenge aur agar same building mein aap log floor badha lenge to usko vertical scaling kahenge vertical scaling quick hai lekin limited aur mahangi padti hai ek building ke upar aap ek limited floors hi bana sakte ho usi tarah ek particular machine ko bhi aap ek limit tak hi resite kar sakte ho horizontal scaling complicated software development ke liye better solution maana jaata hai to agar koi agli baar aap logon se scaling ki baat kare to aapko pata hai ye kya hoti hai

data.title: where he is talking about AI software developer
data.text: ai software developer ab aa chuka hai let ne launch kar diya hai apna rlet agent jo ki fully functional ai software developer hai isko aap log bas okaj instructions dete raho yeh khud bakuda dega aur iski sabse khaas baat yeh hai ki beech-beech mein ye aapse cross questions poochta hai aur aapse feedback leta rehta hai taki aap santusht raho isko ek real software developer ke jaisa banaya gaya hai jo ki apne manager se feedback leta rahega aur kaam karta rahega ek sabse badhiya baat jo mujhe lagi wo yeh hai ki yeh free tier mein available hai yani ki aap isko free of cost istemaal kar sakte ho aur apni pasand ka software bana sakte ho using just a promt so gaiz maine let ki app jo hai wo phone mein open kar li hai aur jaise main pc mein promt deta hun main waise hi phone mein bhi print de sakta hun aur yeh repped agent apna kaam shuru kar dega ab ye jo session hai isko main desktop par bhi waapas aakar continue kar sakta hun maine ek fully fleshed video banaya hai rlet agent ke upar usko main description mein aap logon ke liye link kar dunga

data.text: security ko lekar ek main savaal puchunga ki kaise kuch aur device pe chale jaoge kuch aur location pe chale jaoge that is one step towards security haalaanki uske saath hi kaafi saari cheeze saath hi saath jaati hai vahaan pe threats jo aate hain email pe spams jo aate hain vo sab ham block karte hain bad actors jo internet pe hote jo hamesha try karte hain ki aapke account ka username aur password ham le len to vahaan pe bahut saare defenders hamne laga ke rakhe hain jiske kaaran ye sab cheeze aapki dete hone nahin dete hain

data.title: Google3 Major Reasons
data.text: so guys main prakash ke saath chai pee raha tha, who is india lead customer engineering businesses ko prakash kyun google3 major reasons hai first is collaboration kyunki vo itni ache se aapko collaboration karne deta hai document pe sheets pe slides pe more than 10 people 20 people ek saath aa sakte hain collaboration karne ke liye that is the number one reason second is it gives you everything unified to jitni bhi cheezein aapko dikhti hai karta teesri security kyunki jab aap itni saari cheezein saath mein kar rahe ho cloud native hone ke baavjud bhi to security aapko chahiye because kuch aur na ho jaaye kuch kharaab na ho jaaye hamaare system mein major thi ree

data.title: where he is talking about data science skills
data.text: top three skills jo ki har data scientist ko seekhni chahiye number one hai smart use of AI integrations AI ka istemaal with in different apps jaise ki ekal ke andar AI aa gaya hai power bई ke andar AI aa gaya hai agar aap usko istemaal karke apni problem ko solve nahi kar rahe hai then you are missing out for sure number two hai machine learning and deep learning as a data scientist bahut sare log stuck kar jaate hai data crunching mein data analysis mein lekin vo log machine learning aur data science kabhi seekhte nahi hai aur sochte hai ki ye unka domain nahi hai lekin 2025 and beyond mein aap logon ko machine learning apply karna zarur aana chahiye number three hai communication and soft skills at the end of the day kuch bhi kaam hum karte hai vo karte hai kisi problem ko solve karne ke liye aur agar aap log problem at hand ko acche se solve kar pa rahe hai you are a successful data scientist ab agar aap log data science step by step seekhna chahte hai to main aap logon ko recommend karunga simply learn ka ye data science ka course simply learn ka ye data science ka course aap logon ko python-pip mein pint comment mein aur bio mein provide kar dunga

data.title: ai and machine learning
data.text: 2025 mein agar mujhe sirf ek skill pick karne ka option ho to pata hai main kaun si skill pick karunga? any guesses? yes, you guessed it right its ai and machine learning. self driving car se leke personalized recommendations tak and chat gpt se lekar ai assistant coding tools tak machine learning chai hui hai. machine learning ek driving force bana hua hai har innovation ke piche mere opinion mein we are going to see a drastring. machine learning and ai ye ek aisi future proof skill hai jo ki main aaj ki tarikh mein safely recommend kar sakta hoon sab logon ko sikhna aur isko sikhna bhi behad aasan hai. aap log mera 100 days of code python-pip bm ke saath collaboration mein hai aur agar aap log screen mein diya hua coupon code use karte hain to aapko 20 scholarship milegi on all master programs offered by simply learn description and pin comment mein main aap logon ke liye aur information include kar dunga to check out jarur karna

data.title: where he is talking about Kasho AI
data.text: Agar aap log aaj bhi AI error mein manual testing karte hai then this tool will feel illegal to know kasho AI aap logon ke liye AI ki sahaayata se test cases generate karne mein madad karta hai aap logon ke paas multiple input methods hote hain jisse ki aap log apni API ke baare mein kush ko bata sakte hain aur vo aap logon ke liye automatic test cases generate kar dega sirf itna hi nahi aap logon ko ek bahut achchha starting point to milta hi aap usko change karke ek particular test ko edit bhi kar sakte hain ye aap logon ki existify jyada mehnat karne ki jarurat nahi hai simply kushva AI ko apni pipeline mein plug in kar dena hai aur kush AI aap logon ke liye desk cases generate kar dega aap log dekh sakte ho ki kush ne 143 test cases in less than five minutes generate kar diye hain aap log screen par diye hue coupon code ka istemaal karke kasho ke paid plans par 25% off pa sakte ho to description mein caption mein main uska link daal dunga aap log check out zarur karna

data.title: where he is talking about AI tool
data.text: aap log agar school college ya phir research kar rahe ho to this ai tool feels illegal to know ai thar ek aisa ai hai jiski madad se aap log custom academic work produce kar sakte ho with a single prompt to hum log yahaan par create for free pe click karenge aur yahaan par hum log apna prompt de denge jaise ki maine yahaan par likh diya the evolution of computers next par click karunga to mujhse puchega ye kitna lamba chahiye medium pe rakh ke main next karunga phir iske baad ye mujhse tone puchega main analytical tone ko choose karunga aur next par click karunga to ab ye mujhse puch raha hai kis style mein likhna hai main harvard ka style choose kar ke next par click karunga aur ye likhna shuru kar dega ye mujhe table of contents dikha dega aur ye table of contents dekhne ke baad main isko change bhi kar sakta hun aur ek baar maine isko review kar diya to main next par click karunga aur ye jo hai wo generate karna shuru kar dega aur aap log dekho isne ye sab mere liye likh diya hai is text ko main change bhi kar sakta hun yahaan par summarize bhi kar sakta hun iski tone change kar sakta hun ai ki madad se aajkal poori duniya badli ja rahi hai stool ka link main description mein daal dunga aap log check out zarur karna

data.title: e-commerce in India
data.text: pichhle 10 saal mein India ka e-commerce 175 million users se 345 million users tak pahunch gaya hai aap logon ko jaankar badi hairani hogi ki jo tech hota hai behind e-commerce jo packages aapke ghar mein aate hain it's incredible isko samajhte hain India ki one of the largest e-commerce app Meesho ki sahayata se jab bhi aap Meesho ki app ko kholte hain tab Mo ke advance data science models aap logon ki preferences ko samajhte hain jaise ki age gender demographics aur usi hisaab se aap logon ko product se commend kiye jaate hain product search mein ye advance NLP aur super fast API ka istemal karte hain aur agar is scale ki baat karun to inke machine learning models handle karte hain 10 million inferences per second aur API latency 30 milli seconds it's so good to see companies like Meesho use kar rahi hain cutting edge OCR tech ka bhi matlab aap image upload kar sakte ho aur OCR technique ka istemal karke aap logon ko products recommend kar diye jaayenge IKE gen I chat bots chutkiyon mein aapki queries ko solve kar dete hain and it actually blew my mind lekin ye sara kuchh ba show 14 ab ki app mein deta hai aap logon ka kya kahana hai mujhe comment section mein jarur batana

data.title: where he is talking about skills gap in colleges and online courses
data.text: aaj ki taarikh mein industry mein jo skills chahiye vo humare college mein bilkul nahi padhai ja rahi hai sadly skills jaise ki generate AI digital marketing modern programming languages game development almost kisi college mein nahi padhaye jaate hain ab is tarah ki skills ko aap log simply learn jaise platform se seekh toh sakte hain lekin na hi toh college mein react padhaya jaata hai neck JS nahi padhaya jaata hai modern javascript nahi padhai jaati hai machine learning AI data science data analytics bhi sahi se nahi padhai jaati hai so humare liye bohot zyada important ho jaata hai ki online resources ka istemaal karke hum upskill karein aur classical mathematic and DSA ke algorithm ke saath saath modern industry mein aane wali cheezon ko bhi padhein is gap ko fill karne ke liye simply learn ne nikale hain kuch courses jo ki cover karte hain react generative AI digital marketing cyber security project management aur devops jaise technologies ko jo college mein amuman taur par nahi padhaye jaate hain ab simply learn reviewed and recommended hai by forbes aur aap logon ko yahan par bohot saari success stories bhi dekhne ko milti hain comment simply learn and l send you the link to the best courses by simply learn

data.title: where he is talking about instagram post generation and editing
data.text: guys agar aap log instagram.in hai aapke instagram2 post hai e-commerce product port hai blog to poster mai yaha par text to post chun lunga aur mai yaha par isko bataunga ki 5 atml tax u must know par ek post likh do aap yaha par aspect ratio vagairah ye sare option set kar sakte ho jaise hi mai generate par click karunga ye post generate karna shuru kar dega aur ye bahut jaldi post generate karke deta hai in fact multiple post generate karke deta hai jaise ki aap log yaha par dekh sakte ho aur aap dekh sakte ho hamare ye post ready ho chuke hai to isne caption bhi de diya edit karne ka option bhi de diya yaha par aap log ka pura timeline khul jayega aap log yaha par text badal sakte hai photo badal sakte hai kamal ki editing isme kar sakte hai aur uske baad instagram2 journey ko aur smooth karne ke liye iska link mai aap logo ko print comment mai de dunga isko check out jarur karna

data.title: where he is talking about AI article
data.text: gais aartikl likhne vale eai ke bare mein to ham sabne suna lekin kya aapko pata hai ki ek aisa eai hai jo ki eai se likhe hue aartikl ko hyumanae form mein kanvart karta hai eai hyumana aur is tarah ka ek tul hai maan lo ki chaar jipti se aap log ek aartikl janaret kar rahe ho ab is eai janaret aartikl ko agar aap log difrent tul se sarch karoge to aap log ko milega ye eai dwara likha hua aartikl hai yaani ki eai ditekshan tuls isko pakad lenge ki yah ek eai ritan aartikl hai eai hyumana aap log ko help karta hai isi tarah ke aartikl ko hyumanae form mein kanvart karne mein ab isi aartikl ko agar main dalunga eai hyum mein aur iske baad hyumana karunga to aap log dekho ki saare tuls jo ki pahle isko bata rahe the eai ke dwara ritan hai ab bata rahe hain ki ye eai ke dwara ritan nahin hai tul ka link main diskripshan mein de dunga kolej stjudents iska galat istemaal mat karna gai aartikl likhne vale eai ke bare mein to ham sabne suna lekin kya aapko pata hai ki ek aisa eai hai jo ki eai se likhe hue aartikl ko hyumanae form mein kanvart karta hai eai hyumana is tarah ka ek tul hai maan lo ki chaar jipti se aap log ek aartikl janaret kar rahe ho ab is eai janaret aartikl ko agar aap log difrent tul se sarch karoge to aap log ko milega ye eai

data.title: where he is talking about AI for Advertisement
data.text: ai ki sahaayata se ab aap log edvartizament bana sakate hain pahale kya hota tha ki ek prodakt link hota tha ek hyooman samajhata tha ki prodakt kya hai aur usake baad usaka vidoeeo aid banaata tha proses kaaphee lambee thee aaj kee taareekh mein joge ai naam ka ek tool hai jisako aap prodakt ka link de do aur vo aapako poora ka poora vidoeeo aid banaakar de dega sabase pahale vo link se deteils phaitch karega usake baad ai se skript likhega usake baad aap log skript ko tveet kar sakate ho ek ai etar banaega jo ki aapake prodakt ke baare mein baat karega saare kaam otomatik hote hain aur aapako ek vidoeeo mein mil jaata hai lip sin ke saath ye saimpal vidoeeo jara dekhiye da asus2 bled phan end self kleening tekonolojee ins stebal parphormens leting yoo gem langan vithaut intarapshans apagred to seemales anintarapted gem plee tude ab aaj kee taareekh mein is tarah ke ai aa chuke hain jo kaam pahale insaan kiya karata tha vo ab ai kar raha hai is baare mein aapaka kya opinian hai vo bataen aur usee ke saath-saath joge ai ko aap log chek aut karana usaka link main pent koment mein de doonga

data.title: where he is talking about a tech crash
data.text: hand written boarding pass dekha hai kabhi aapne ye mujhe mila 19 july 2024 ko jab microsoft's mein security manage karti hai apne on going operation ke dauraan inhone ek update push kiya jo ki normal process ka ek hissa tha lekin is sensor confinn update ne windows ke bias mein ek logic error trigger kar diya to jitne bhi window systems crowd strike ke falcon sensor ko run kar rahe the wo sab impact hue hain unme bhee sot aa gaya mera khud ka work laptop nahin khul raha tha aur main ekdam se dar gaya travel bhi kar raha tha but jab pata chala ki yaar pura airport hila pada hai sari duniya mein alag-alag systems jo ki falcon ko run kar rahe the wo hile pade hain tab kahin na kahin jaan mein jana hai ki yaar ye problem sirph main hee face nahin kar raha hun puri duniya face kar rahi hai and it was very quickly fixed lekin maine khud ne impact dekha airline pe kitna khatarnak pada so ya maine bahut nazdeek se dekha ki ye duniya ka bahut bada tac crash tha

data.title: where he is talking about ai as a developer
data.text: ai ka sabse khatarnak use case ej a developer aap logon ko batata hun passes ne apni desktop app kal hi launch kari hai jiska naam hai passes copilot plus ye proactiveley dekhta hai ki aap log kya kar rahe ho aur aap isse pooch sakte ho sawal jaise ki just mujhe kaun sa error aaya ye mumkin ho paya hai passes copilot plus ki is desktop app se usually ai ko aapko sab kuch batana padta hai lekin ye aapke computer mein run karta hai data aapke computer mein rakhta hai llm aap apne pasand ka chun sakte ho aur aap isse ye pooch sakte ho ki just kaun sa error aaya hai maine bhi ek kara isme kya problem hai basically aapko isko bahut jyada context nahin dena padta hai kyunki ye proactiveley context ko leta rahta hai ai bahut jyada khatarnak hota ja raha hai lekin aapko bhi khatarnak banana padega aur is tarah ke tools ko istemaal karna padega peace ke recent blog post mein 20 novel ai prompts jo ki aap is tarah se use kar sakte ho ki jaise mujhe abhi just kaun sa error aaya ye documentation se mujhe batao kaise ye implement kare is tarah ke prompts mumkin ho pae hain main pieces ki app ka link aap logon ko pin comment mein de dunga aur us blog jaise resource ka comment bhi main aap logon ko pin comment mein de dunga

data.title: where he is talking about driverless taxi
data.text: ye hai driverless taxi, isme koi driver nahi hai andar! o ye rahi o bina driver ke car hai! ye dekho to yah hai v n amazing application of ai! main san francisco mein gaya tha to maine ye driverless taxi try kari! isme koi driver nahi hai, khud se chalti hai yaar ye to aapko andar se dikhata hun! vemo! so seat belt humne laga li hai aur i am very excited! so hume karna hai start ride! aur yahan pe koi driver nahi hai again koi bhi driver nahi hai! wow wow this is so good yaar! o this is awesome! yaar bhai dekho koi nahi chala raha is gadi ko koi bhi nahi chala raha! to dekh rahe ho guy yahan pe log aur car ye sab na artificial dra karke dikhata hai! y can do like this aise kar sakte ho aap! so guy mere ko to bada maza aaya vemo taxi try out karke aur ye taxi humko drop off karke wapas khud b khud chali gai! o wow o bhai dekho speed dekho iski! heavy driver hai aiv! o bhai

data.title: where he is talking about olama and ai
data.text: so guys hume sabse pehle kya karna hai ki  lama likhna hai google.com aa jaega uske baad lama ko download kar lena hai ab ye kya kar rahe hain hum kyu kar rahe hain mai windows10 banane mai aap log ko madad karega aap kisi bhi tarah ka integration kar sakte hain basically hota kya hai ki jo cha jpti hota hai usko nana mai on karta hu na aap on karte hain wo open i on karta hai unhone host kar rakha hai aur usko aap use karoge aap unka powerful model use karna chahte ho to aap log ko pe karna padega unki api use karna chahte ho to aap log ko pe karna padega lekin yaha par hota kya hai ki agar aap olama ki sahayata se kisi bhi ek open source model ko run karna chahte ho to wo aap kar sakte ho aur ye powerful aur kamal ki cheej isliye hai aur hum sabhi ko aani chahiye isliye kyuki ab ai era aa raha hai aur ai era mai agar aapne ai ko sikhna nahi sikha then you are going to be in trouble seriously you are going to be in trouble with that said hum log ab lama ko install karenge to basically ye kya hai ye tool hai jiski sahayata se aap log alag-alag mad models ko locally run kar sakte ho to mai yaha par kya karunga isko install kar lunga just like any other program aur aap log yaha par dekho alag-alag tarah ke models inke yaha par hain available aap log inko use kar sakte ho aap log code lama ka istemal kar sakte ho jo ki coding ke liye ek open source model hai ab yaha par dekho lama is running yaani ki ye lama chal raha hai aap log yaha par click karke olama run lama 2 likhkar lama 2 model ko run kar sakte ho ab dekho ye model jaldi se download kar raha hai mere liye around 8 minute ka samay ye le raha hai jaise ye download ho jaega uske baad mai cha jbt ki tarah isko use kar sakta hu and why is it powerful kyuki cha jpti cloud pe run karta hai to aap log dekh sakte ho ki ye model download ho chuka hai aur jaise ye model download hoga ye run ho jaega aur mai iske baad isko cha gbtee ki tarah istemal kar sakta hu ab agar maan lo mai chahta hu ek aisa system banana jisme sab kuch mere pc par run kare bina internet connection ke tab is tarah ke models bahut jyada kaam aate hain phir agar mai koi kaam bulk mai karna chahta hu aur mai pe nahi karna chahta open ai ki api ke liye to mai ye kar sakta hu to yaha par dekho mai likhunga hu is ronaldo to mai isse puch raha hu hu is ronaldo to kya ye mujhe bata paega haa isne mujhe bata diya ki bhai wo footballer hai aur mai internet se connected agar nahi bhi hu tab bhi ye model chalega bilkul badhiya chalega kyuki ye model maine download kar liya ab agar maan lo ki mai kuch aur puchta hu ya mai isse kuch question puchta hu what is 7+ se to ye mujhe bata dega ab guys agar ye aap log ko slow lag raha hai to mai ek baar ke liye aapko bata du ki ye meri pc pe run kar raha hai ye mere pc ke resources ko istemal karke run kar raha hai aur agar aapke paas achha hardware hai tab ye aur bhi fast run karega lekin ye speed bhi iski kaafi incredible hai agar socha jae to khaas kar hum model abhi run kar rahe hain l 2 jo ki ek bahut powerful open source model hai meta ki taraf se ab aap log yaha par dekho mai likh sakta hu what is 2+ 2 aur yah mujhe bata dega ki 2+ 2 4 hota hai ab agar mai inme se koi dusra model run karna chahta hu to mai apne terminal ko khol ke simply uspe likhunga oma run mil aur ye mistal ko bhi download kar lega aur mai parallelly alag-alag models run kar sakta hu jaise maan lo mai chahta hu ki mai oma run lama 2 ye yaha par maan lo mai run karna chahta hu aur mistal mai yaha par run karna chahta hu dekho jo lama 2 hai wo ekdam run ho gaya kyuki ye model downloaded hai mere computer mai mai isse puchta hu hu is code with haari and i like the fact ki isne bata diya hu is code with haari matlab lama two ke andar code mein dari ki jankari hai i like it so bilkul isi tarah se mai mistal ko bhi run and download kar sakta hu i hope ki aap log ko ye video pasand aaya aur aap log olama ke bare mai samajh gae kis tarah se isko istemal karna hai ek bahut hi quick cheej hai olam.in banau jisme mai sirf aap log ko is tarah ki cheeze batau ki ai ko kaise use karna hai kya nai-nai cheeze aa rahi hain agar aap log sehmat hain meri is baat se mujhe comment jarur karna ki playlist banani chahiye ya nahi banani chahiye using e aai ki aur mai ek playlist banakar description mai ya phir print comment mai uska link aap log ko de dunga abhi ke liye is video mai itna hi gai thank you so much gaiz for watching this video and i will see you next time

data.title: Advantages of Coding
data.text: sabse pehla hai paisa lo work life balance to hai bhai lekin high bank balance bhi hai phir high career span hota hai agar aap log ek cricketer ko ya phir kisi ek sport person ko dekhen to shayad 35 40 saal tak wo kaam karte hain len dar efficienty agar apne aap ko fit rakhe to 70-75 saal tak bhi bahut hi aaram se kaam kar sakta hai aur jaise jaise time badhta hai uski jo value hai badhti jati hai kyunki uska experience badhta jaata hai teesra hai ki aap log remote work kar sakte ho are bhai apne ghar pe baith ke kaam karo kahin jaane ki zarurat nahin hai ghar pe baitho thand hai to apne kambal ke andar baith ke coding karo chautha hai ki j jobs badhti ja rahi hai time ke saath saath zyada jobs aati ja rahi hai aur aasan hota ja raha hai coders ke liye khaas kar un coders ke liye jo ki bahut sahi se cheezon ko samajhte hain kaam karna aur ijly paise kamana agar aap logon ne initially mehnat daali hai to phir paanchva jo ki mera bhi reason hai coding karne ka ki ye passion ban jaata hai ab yaar paisa mile work life balance ho kuch ho na ho lekin ek passion hota hai sports ki tarah main dekhta hoon coding ko aur main coding ko jab karta hoon to mera dil khush ho jaata hai maza aa jaata hai sabse pehla hai paisa lo work life balance to hai bhai lekin high

data.title: where he is talking about tech related work and programming
data.text: programming karke app log bahut paise ijly kama sakte hai ab yaha par mai sirf programming ki baat nahi karunga mai kahunga ki app tech related work karke jo laptop hai appka iska istemaal karke app bahut saare paise ijly kama sakte hai internet connection hai laptop hai appke pass appka comfort hai ye game changing isliye hai kyuki ek to app apne ghar ke comfort mai hi kaam kar sakte hai dusri cheej ye app jaise-jaise is field mai knowledge kisi bhi field mai lete hai matlab computer related field mai to appki knowledge compound hoti hai expo hai shiyam pound hoti hai mai app log ko is baat ka example deta hu agar app log aaj 19 saal ke ho app logo ko letas se computer programming mai bahut basic cheeje aati hai ab 20 ke ho gaye to appko chaar baatein aur pata chalengi phir uske baad un chaar baato ka istemaal karke app aur kuch banaoge aur vo jo appne banaya hai uska use karke app aur kuch banaoge aaj appne mehnat karke ek cheej sikhi to kal app log usi mehnat ka istemaal karke kam mehnat mai jyada achieve kar sakte hai phir ye jo knowledge appne akwire kari iska istemaal karke app log aur aage aur kam mehnat mai aur jyada achieve kar sakte hai

data.title: where he is talking about money making from coding
data.text: coding se paise kis tarah se aap log bana sakte ho yah aap logon ko ab bataata hun sabse pahle to freelancing kar sakte ho f apavark peepal par aar jaisee websites par doosara tareeka hai ki aap log instagram's bana sakata hun mujhe bhee apanee ejensee ke saath kaam karava lo ya phir aap log kisee bizanes ko aproch kar sakate ho aapako lagata hai ki yaar is bizanes kee is aip mein yah kamee aap kar sakate ho to aap unako aproch karo teesara apane lokal area mein apane friend sarkal mein logon kee प्रॉब्लम्स ko solv karo agar aapaka koee dost hai jo ki ek bizanes ko phon karata hai aur aap log ko lagata hai ki yaar aap apanee tekinikal skil se usako help kar sakate ho yoo ken chaarj manee for det chautha ye hai ki agar aap log kolej mein ho to apane kolej kee kaintins ko kolej ke jo lokal groops vagairah hai unako aap log teks sel kar sakate ho paanchava hai jo ki mainne parsanalee kiya kolej ke profesarss ko aproch karo aur jo projekts unake aandar mein hai unake taim ko aap log bachao kyonki jo kolej ke profesarss hote hain unake paas taim bahut kam hota hai aur aise mein agar aap log unako koee aisa solyoochan de dete kak unaka taim bachaatee hai f chahae vo maarksas ivelueshan ke lie ho ya phir unake kisee पर्सनल projekts ke lie ho de aar going too pe yoo for det

data.title: where he is talking about programming languages
data.text: ab programming aap log kaun si language se start karoge agar aap log ek beginner ho to python2 understand hai aur aap logon ko bahut aasani se samajh mein aayegi jis tarah se sudo code likha jata hai jaise ki aap log kisi ko bata rahe ho ki kya-kya likhna hai step by step algorithm ko likhte hain waise hi aap log likh sakte ho sabse bada fayda ye hai ki aap data science ai ml aur usi ke saath-saath web development ui development vo sab python ki sahayata se kar sakte ho school college mein agar aap log ho to aap log c c+ p seekho kyonki c s p p aap logon ki understanding bahut jyada badhati hai dsa karna hai c s + ke saath karo ya java ke saath karo java c+ p agar aap log college vagairah mein hai to aap log seekh sakte ho aur main c c+ p ko jyada better manunga java se agar aap log college mein ho kyonki aap log ki foundation ko banata hai ab agar aap log sirf web development karna chahte ho to javascript ko seekh lo javascript kaafi badhiya language hai web development ke liye front end back end dono bana sakte ho javascript se even database bhi main kahunga mango db javascript ke syntax par hi aadharit hai java aur dsa aap log kar sakte ho agar aap log app development mein jaana chahte ho kyonki java aapka app development bhi karva dega dsa bhi karva dega aur ek achhi understanding bhi deta hai

data.title: where he is talking about degree for coding
data.text: kya coding karne ke liye degree matter karti hai ab ki market aur industry ke hisaab se bilkul bhi matter nahin karti hai degree main khud IT kharagpur se paas out hun with silver medal aur mainne to bahut padhai kari hai yaar college mein uske baad bhi main kah raha hun ki bina degree ke aap log job prapt kar sakte ho apni dream job pa sakte ho aur degree pane walon se bhi better kar sakte ho aap mein se bahut sare logon ka sawal hota hai ki mera college achcha nahin hai mainne to college kiya hi nahin ya to main ghar se degree kar raha hun aur aise mein aapko yaar pareshan hone ki zaroorat nahin hai skills par kaam karo aur aap log ko employer hire kar lega kyunki employer aajkal aap log ki skills dekhta hai mainly aur skill ko test kar ne ke tarike wo badalte rahenge interview round jis company mein jaise hote hain wo badalte rahenge eventually chahte hain ki bhai aapko kuchh aata bhi hai ki nahin aata hai koi bhi programming languages seekh kar aur coding karke paise earn kar sakta hai age long age aapke andar passion hai and age long age aap log mehnat karke skills develop karne mein apne time and efforts ko invest karte ho

data.title: mobile development, java, kotlin, and AI development
data.text: agar aap log mobile development mein jaana chahte hain java aur kotlin seekh sakte hain java aur kotlin mein kaafi similarities hai traditional mobile development ki baat karein to java ko istemaal kiya jaata tha usmein java ko use kiya jaata tha andra development ki main language ke taur par lekin baad mein google3 dsa kar sakte hain aap log back end development kar sakte hain spring boot ki sahayata se aap log desktop apps bana sakte hain aur usi ke saath-saath java se dsa karke ek poora ek complete sa package ban jaata ki yaar aap logon ko java mein gui banana aata hai aapko web development karna aata hai aap logon ko back ends banaane aate hain android development aata hai phir kotlin mein entry aap logon ki bahut aasaan ho jaati hai kyonki aapko java pehle se aata hai to java is still a language jo ki aap log 2024 mein seekh sakte hain aur as first language bhi seekh sakte hain kyonki data types ka memory management ka is sabka ek kaafi achha gyaan aap logon ko milta hai agar aap log java se start karte hain to aur ai development to ek aisi field hai jiska scope badhta hi chala jaa raha hai kyonki ai development kahin jaane waala nahin hai

data.title: where he is talking about learning method
data.text: rabar dak methad ek bahut hi intaresting and  efektiv larning methad hai jisase ki aap log ek partikular cheej ko seekh lete ho phir ek rabar dak lete ho aur us rabar dak ko samajhaate ho apanee laingvej mein jaise maan lo mainne rikurs ke baare mein padha to mere paas agar koee nahin hai to main apane room mein ek rabar dak ko rakhoonga aur main usako samajhaoon ki rikurs kya hota hai kyonki jis cheej ko main samajha nahin pa raha hoon vo cheej mujhe samajh mein bhee nahin aaee to agar main usako samajha pa raha hoon to main us cheej ko bahut hee kleeeyar samajh sakata hoon aur mujhe apane is savaal ka aansar milega ki kya mainne vo cheej sahee se samajhee aisa kaun sa kansept hai jo ki mere samajh mein nahin aaya us ovarol kansept mein se to is takaneek kansept ekadam simpal hai agar aap apanee kahee huee baat ko rabar dak ko nahin samajha pa rahe ho usaka matalab vo aapako samajh mein nahin aa rahee hai par ek partikular cheej hee mein aap phans rahe ho rabar dak ko samajhaate vakt samajh jao vo kansept aapaka veek hai jaakar us kansept ko pakka karo isase aap log kabhee pablikalee kod reevyu karoge to aapaka konfidens kyonki olaradee aap logon ne rabar dap ko samajha rakha hai stej phiyar aapaka khatm hoga aapaka konfidens badhega ek tarah se aap aisa samajh lo pablik speeking kee bhee praiktis ho rahee hai kansept bhee aapako pata chal raha hai kahaan par aapaka veek hai ek teer se maltipal nishaane lag ja rahe hain kul mila ke

data.title: PHP Future in 2024
data.text: ab PHP ek scripting language hoti hai jo ki html5 par se bhi jyada websites ko power karta hai even in 2024 aur agar aap logo ko PHP aati hai to aap wordpress sites ko debugger kar sakte hain aur achhe paise kama sakte hain iski ek kafi badi community hai jiski vajah se ye kafi popular hai aur isko kafi log istemal karte hain jiski vajah se isme kam bahut jyada hai market me to bhai PHP ko sikhna sabse pahle to aasan hai aasan hai uske baad kafi reward bhi sabit hota hai plus bahut sara kam market me plus bahut sari websites PHP se power karti hai aap log chahe to apna blog start kar sakte hain aur wordpress ke sath-sath agar aapko wordpress ko power karne wali language aati hai to aap plug in development kar sakte hain aur bhi bahut sari chije kar sakte hain PHP ki sahayta se PHP ka ek framework bhi hota hai laravel jo ki aap logo ko bahut hi professional websites banane me madad karta hai to PAP ka future bilkul bhi khatam nahi hua hai agar aap logo ko aisa lagta hai to ye behad galat hai PHP is still a language that you can learn in 2024
